title: OUR STAFF TEAM
description: Meet the dedicated team behind our server. Our staff members work tirelessly to ensure a fun and engaging environment for all players. Feel free to reach out to them if you need any assistance!

members.name: DuckgamingVI
members.description: Visionary behind Indus Realms ‚Äî built from the ground up with passion for fair play, custom content, and endless adventure.

members.name: ArgoKnight
members.description: Oversees operations, community direction and major releases. Ensures smooth gameplay and high server uptime.

members.name: PixelSage
members.description: Leads content roadmaps, seasonal events and partnerships. Focused on player experience and fairness.

members.name: DuckgamingVI
members.description: Keeps the entire realm running like clockwork. Balances staff management, server moderation.

members.name: BlockSmith
members.description: Handles plugins, performance tuning and backend stability. Builds tools to keep Indus Realms blazing fast.

members.name: LavaBloom
members.description: Manages staff schedules, applications and community guidelines. Keeps chats friendly and helpful.

members.name: DuckgamingVI
members.description: Leads the moderator team with experience and a watchful eye.

members.name: CinderFox
members.description: Active in-game support, reports handling and quick responses to rule issues during peak hours.

members.name: EchoRune
members.description: Greets newcomers, helps with claims and mediates player disputes to keep the realm fun.

joinTeam.title: Want to Join Our Team?
joinTeam.description: We're always looking for dedicated players to join our staff team. Applications are reviewed regularly. Apply through our Discord server if you're interested!
